crisscross.translation[0].definitions[0]: to make a pattern of straight lines that cross each other
crisscross.translation[0].definitions[1]: to travel many times from one side of an area to another
They spent the next two years crisscrossing the country by bus.
crisscross.translation[1].definitions[0]: a pattern made up of a lot of straight lines that cross each other
Inside the box was a crisscross of wires.
